modName: Dark Souls for Magic College Music and Main Menu
summary: Dark Souls Music replacer for Magic College Music and Main Menu
descriptionHtml:
[color=#999999][size=4]
[/size][/color]
[font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=4]
[size=5]Dark Souls for Magic College Music and Main Menu[/size][/size][size=4][size=5]
[/size][/size][/color][/font][color=#999999][size=3][font=Georgia][i]I have created this mod originally only for myself. But I think you also like this.[/i][/font][/size][/color][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3]




[/size][/color][/font][/i][font=Georgia][color=#666666][size=3]Main File I:[/size][/color][/font][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i]
[font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=4][size=5]Dark Souls for Magic College Music[/size][/size][/color][/font][/size][/color][/font][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=4][size=5]

[/size][/size][/color][/font]Is a music replacer for the fantastic mod:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36381?tab=description]Magic College Music - Songs for Academy[/url] by [/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3]Master85 (checco85)
[/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][size=3]This mod adds 17 songs for the College of Winterhold[/size][/size][/color][/font][/i][/size][/color][/font][/i][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3].

[/size][/color][/font][/i][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3]My mod changes the original music into a small,
repetitive selection of 5 Dark Souls melodies.[/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i]You need: The original !
[/size][/color][/font][/i][color=#999999][size=3][i][font=Georgia](Endorsed the Author. [/font][/i][/size][/color][color=#999999][size=3][i][font=Georgia]Do not forget !)[/font][/i][/size][/color]

[i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][size=3][color=#666666]After downloading the ZIP file, unpack the archive
and copy it to your Skyrim / Data directory.
Overwrite the  Music file of the original.[/color]
[/size][/i][/size][/color][/font][/i]
[color=#666666][i][font=Georgia][size=3][i][size=3][size=3][i]You like it?  Do not forget to endorsed me  &  [/i][/size][/size][/i][/size][/font][/i][/color][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][size=3][color=#666666][size=3][i][i][font=Georgia][size=3]Master85 (checco85)[/size][/font][/i][/i][/size][/color]


[/size][/i][/size][/color][/font][/i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/i][font=Georgia][color=#666666][size=3]Main File II:[/size][/color][/font][i][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][/i][/i][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=4][size=5]Dark Souls for Main Menu[/size][/size][/color][/font][/size][/color][/font][i][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=4][size=5]
[/size][/size][/color][/font]
[/size][/color][/font][/i]This is a very simple sound overhaul of the main menu.
Since the music is very important to me, I decided to share it with you.

[color=#666666]After downloading the ZIP file, unpack the archive
and copy it to your Skyrim / Data directory.  (Save the original: mus_maintheme)
Simple, for free . . .
[/color][/i][/size][/color][/font][color=#666666]
[/color][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i][color=#666666][i][font=Georgia][size=3][i][size=3][size=3][i]You like it?  Do not forget to endorsed me[/i][/size][/size][/i][/size][/font][/i].[/color]




[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92872/92872-1533367824-676561093.png[/img][/i][/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=3][i]



[center][youtube]mXj7_zUh2ok[/youtube]
1 Hour of relaxing Dark Souls music mixed with Ambient sounds[/center]
[/i][/size][/color][/font]

[color=#666666]..............................................................................................................................................................................
[/color][size=4]
[font=Georgia][color=#666666][i][i]
